history.content:
Hi,

I submitted my OPT documents three days ago and suddenly got a question (all the packages were delivered to USCIS yesterday.)

If I have a job offer in my hand and finished signing up the contract, should I let this know to BIO? 

And, would this somehow help me to get OPT approval faster?

I'm worried that the approval process will be delayed and my EAD card might be delivered late since USCIS shows that it will take 3-6 months to get the OPT approval & EAD card on average.

My official start day of working is August 1st though.

If any of you applied for the OPT and got the EAD card, please let me know your total waiting time.

Thank you.
history.subject: Question Regarding OPT
